title: Embracing multi-functionality in European infrastructure projects: A system of systems perspective
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Sustainable Futures, Volume 8

Author(s): Johan Ninan, Yirang Lim, Hans de Boer, Ossi Pesamaa, Maarten Van Acker, Eva Schwab, Johannes Bernsteiner, Peter Soderholm, Marcel Hertogh
